election.tally
Class AbstractBallotCounting

java.lang.Object
  election.tally.CountConfiguration
      election.tally.ElectionStatus
          election.tally.AbstractBallotCounting
Direct Known Subclasses:
BallotCounting
public abstract class AbstractBallotCounting
extends ElectionStatus

Ballot counting algorithm for elections to Oireachtas Eireann - the National Parliament of Ireland.

Author:
Dermot Cochran (c) 2005-2009 Dermot Cochran Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions: The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. This work was supported, in part, by Science Foundation Ireland grant 03/CE2/I303_1 to Lero - the Irish Software Engineering Research Centre (www.lero.ie) and, in part, by the European Project Mobius IST 15909 within the IST 6th Framework. This software reflects only the authors' views and the European Community is not liable for any use that may be made of the information contained therein.
See Also:
Part XIX of the Electoral Act, 1992, Department of Environment and Local Government: Count Requirements and Commentary on Count Rules, sections 3-16, Formal Verification of Voting, JML Homepage

getOrder

protected int getOrder(Candidate fromCandidate,
                       Candidate toCandidate)
Determine the number of continuing candidates with a higher remainder in their transfer quotient, or deemed to have a higher remainder.

Parameters:
fromCandidate - Candidate, already elected, with surplus votes to donate
toCandidate - Continuing candidate eligible to receive vote transfer
Returns:
The number of continuing candidates with a higher quotient remainder than this candidate

getPotentialTransfers

protected int getPotentialTransfers(Candidate fromCandidate,
                                    int toCandidateID)
Gets the potential number of transfers from one candidate to another.

Parameters:
fromCandidate - Candidate from which to check the transfers
toCandidateID - Candidate ID to check for receipt of transferred votes
Returns:
Number of votes potentially transferable from this candidate to that candidate

getQuota

public int getQuota()
Droop quota; number of votes needed to guarantee election.

Returns:
Number of votes required to ensure election

getRoundedFractionalValue

protected int getRoundedFractionalValue(Candidate fromCandidate,
                                        Candidate toCandidate)
Determine the rounded value of a fractional transfer.

Parameters:
fromCandidate - Elected candidate from which to distribute surplus
toCandidate - Continuing candidate potentially eligble to recieve transfers
Returns:
1 if the fractional vote is to be rounded up 0 if the fractional vote is to be rounded down

getStatus

public byte getStatus()
Gets the status of the algorithm in progress.

Returns:
The state variable value ElectionStatus.EMPTY, ElectionStatus.SETTING_UP, ElectionStatus.PRELOAD, ElectionStatus.LOADING, ElectionStatus.PRECOUNT, ElectionStatus.COUNTING, ElectionStatus.FINISHED

getSurplus

public int getSurplus(Candidate candidate)
Determine how many surplus votes a candidate has. query "How many surplus votes does this candidate have?"

Parameters:
candidate - The candidate record
Returns:
The undistributed surplus for that candidate, or zero if the candidate has less than a quota of votes
See Also:
CEV guidelines, page 79, paragraph 120(2)

getTotalSumOfSurpluses

public final int getTotalSumOfSurpluses()
How many surplus votes are available for distribution?

Returns:
The total number of surplus votes for all candidates.

getTotalTransferableVotes

protected int getTotalTransferableVotes(Candidate fromCandidate)
Get the maximum number of votes transferable to continuing candidates.

Parameters:
fromCandidate - Candidate ID from which to check the transfers
Returns:
Number of votes potentially transferable from this candidate

getTransferRemainder

protected int getTransferRemainder(Candidate fromCandidate,
                                   Candidate toCandidate)
Determine the individuals remainder after integer division by the transfer factor for surpluses.

Parameters:
fromCandidate - Elected candidate from which to count to transfers
toCandidate - Continuing candidate eligible to receive votes
Returns:
The size of the quotient remainder

getTransferShortfall

protected int getTransferShortfall(Candidate fromCandidate)
Determine shortfall between sum of transfers rounded down and the size of surplus

Parameters:
fromCandidate - Elected candidate from which to distribute surplus
Returns:
The shortfall between the sum of the transfers and the size of surplus

hasQuota

public boolean hasQuota(Candidate candidate)
Determine if the candidate has enough votes to be elected.

Parameters:
candidate - The candidate in question
Returns:
True if the candidate has at least a quota of votes
See Also:
CEV guidelines, page 79, paragraph 120(2) query "Has the candidate at least a quota of votes?"

isContinuingCandidateID

public boolean isContinuingCandidateID(int candidateID)
Determine if a candidate ID belongs to a continuing candidate.

Parameters:
candidateID - The ID of candidate for which to check the status
Returns:
true if this candidate ID matches that of a continuing candidate

isDepositSaved

public boolean isDepositSaved(int index)
Determine if the candidate has enough votes to save his or her deposit. query "Has this candidate saved his or her deposit?"

Parameters:
index - The candidate for which to check
Returns:
true if candidate has enough votes to save deposit
See Also:
CEV commentary on count rules, section 3 page 13, section 4 page 17 and section 14

isElected

public boolean isElected(Candidate candidate)
Determine if the candidate was elected in any previous round query "Has the candidate been elected?"

Parameters:
candidate - The candidate
Returns:
True if the candidate has already been elected

isHigherThan

protected boolean isHigherThan(Candidate firstCandidate,
                               Candidate secondCandidate)
Determine if one continuing candidate is higher than another, for the purpose of resolving remainders of transfer quotients.

Parameters:
firstCandidate - The first of the candidates to be compared
secondCandidate - The second of the candidates to be compared
Returns:
true if the first candidate is deemed to have receIved more votes than the second
See Also:
Department of Environment and Local Government, Count Requirements and Commentary on Count Rules, section 7, page 25

load

public void load(BallotBox ballotBox)
Open the ballot box for counting.

Parameters:
ballotBox - The ballots to be counted, already "shuffled and mixed".

randomSelection

public int randomSelection(Candidate firstCandidate,
                           Candidate secondCandidate)
Simulate random selection between two candidates.

Parameters:
firstCandidate - The first of the candidates to be selected from
secondCandidate - The second of the candidates to be selected from
Returns:
The candidate ID of the chosen candidate

Parameters:
candidateID - The unique identifier for the excluded candidate

                                   Candidate toCandidate,
                                   int numberOfVotes)
Transfer votes from one candidate to another.

Parameters:
fromCandidate - Elected or excluded candidate
toCandidate - Continuing candidate
numberOfVotes - Number of votes to be transferred command
